Workflow.Name: CLEANUP - Admin | Sync Template v4 (Check Deleted)
Workflow.Description: This long running flow runs every other week, and compares CoE to the tenant to determine if any objects were deleted since last run. Either just marks them as deleted (if env var Also Delete from CoE = no) or deletes them from the CoE (if Also Delete from CoE = yes).

LocalizedName.description: CLEANUP - Admin | Sync Template v4 (Check Deleted)

Description.description: This long running flow runs every other week, and compares CoE to the tenant to determine if any objects were deleted since last run. Either just marks them as deleted (if env var Also Delete from CoE = no) or deletes them from the CoE (if Also Delete from CoE = yes).
